entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
